/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The buildings lining the street are made of brick, their red and white facades standing out against the blue sky. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of urban charm to the scene. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day. A car is parked on the street, adding to the everyday hustle and bustle. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
